fullText: Hadestown is a haunting, beautiful, and ultimately heartbreaking retelling of the ancient Greek myth of Orpheus and Eurydice, set against the backdrop of an industrial wasteland that could be anywhere in America.
dtliExcerpt: Hadestown is a haunting, beautiful, and ultimately heartbreaking retelling of the ancient Greek myth of Orpheus and Eurydice, set against the backdrop of an industrial wasteland that could be anywhere in America.

retelling of the ancient Greek myth of Orpheus and Eurydice
